name: Diganta Goswami
content: Prof. Diganta Goswami's Home Page Diganta Goswami Professor Dept. of Computer Science & Engg. Indian Institute of Technology Guwahati Guwahati - 781039, Assam, INDIA Contact Room No: H-208 Tel: +91 361 2582355 (Off.) +91 361 2584355(Res) Fax: +91 361 2692787 Email: dgoswami@iitg.ernet.in Education | Research | Experience | Teaching | Students | Publications Education Ph.D: Indian Institute of Technology Kharagpur M.E : Indian Institute of Science, Bangalore B.E  :Assam Engg. College, Gauhati University Research My Research interests are in Distributed Systems and Software Engineering (Testing and Program Slicing in particular). Experience Faculty, Jorhat Engineering College, Jorhat, 1987 Asstt. Engineer, ASEB, 1988 - 1989 Faculty, Jorhat Engineering College, Jorhat, 1989 - 1994 Faculty, Assam Engineering College, Guwahati, 1994 - 2001 Assistant Prof., IIT Guwahati, 2002 - 2006 Associate Prof., IIT Guwahati, 2006 - 2011 Professor, IIT Guwahati, 2011 - till date Head, Computer and Communication Centre, IIT Guwahati, 2008 - till date Teaching CS205M(July - Nov, 2015) CS542: Topics in Distributed Systems (July - Nov, 2014) CS203: Formal Languages and Automata Theory (Jan - Apr, 2014)
